PressAnnouncement.PressAnnouncementBody: has it really been 10 years already ?

Er trug schon das Eintracht-Trikot, als viele der heutigen Kreuznacher Kicker nur ein Blitzen im Auge ihres Vaters waren, doch jetzt endet eine Ära: Nach 28 Jahren als Spieler und Trainer zieht sich Bernhard Crixel aus dem operativen Geschäft bei den Blau-Weißen zurück. "Auf eigenen Wunsch", wie Präsi S. betont, denn "einen Bernhard Crixel würden wir niemals feuern!" Der Eintracht-Rekordtorjäger, mit 21 Jahren von Bombeleescher Mainz gekommen, will kurz vor seinem 50. Geburtstag endlich mal länger als eine Woche verreisen und soll nach einer Auszeit wieder in die Vereinsarbeit eingebunden werden - an einem ruhigeren Plätzchen.
Auch der neue Trainer ist ein Eintracht-Urgestein: Außenverteidiger Reimar Hopfenspirger trägt seit 17 Jahren das blau-weiße Jersey und soll sich als Standby-Profi weiter fit halten. "Er hat in den Taktikbesprechungen ohnehin immer reingeplappert, deshalb ist es gut, wenn er endlich das Ruder übernimmt", gibt ihm der Alte auf den Weg mit.

Today marks 10 years since Manager Mashup applied for the job at TFIC (formerly known as Glasgow Celtic FC). In a career filled with highs including a Scottish Cup win, A shot at the SPL title, managing the NT & winning many leagues.
There's been some notable players through the doors as well including the legend that is Adam O'Shannachan & the recently departed Johnathan MacHendrie & countless YS stars who've went onto the U20s. There's a few more yet to come with Jimmie Hughes & Owen Stevenson coming up rather fast.
"It's amazing how those ten years have passed in what seems like 5. There's been moments where I've been places & I'm thinking HT or I'm having ppl text me the scores. I've been all over the world with HT & just can't see myself quitting the beautiful game. Should see another 10 easy if it still exists in 2023!"
Hopefully the next 10 will be as much fun as the first 10! Also a big shout out to Dunky2k [userid=216684] and Asharak [userid=215426] on 10 years too!
Alternativet må have været elendigt.

"В каждом клубе Чесс должен играть хотя бы один татарин". Руководство нашего славного клуба вспомнило эту народную мудрость и немедленно приобрело одного из первых (если не первого) российского татарина. Riyaz прирожденный крайний полузащитник, надеемся на быстрый прогресс в нашей команде молодого и талантливого игрока [playerid=386535126]
Олееее! Олааааа! Вперед наш Чесс-Черкесск!

Club Spokesknight today took time off from preparation to officiate at fellow spokesknight Sir Patrick Stewart's wedding, to make a sombre announcement:
"After 413 games, 84 goals and 97 international caps for Scotland, former club captain and coach [playerid=91341443] Thomas MacRaild has decided to retire at the end of the season. Thomas has realised that there are younger defenders able to take his place, and decided he wanted to hang up his boots. He is a very unusual player, in that he has never left the club he started for in the youth team, and has played for from the age of 17 to 40. Fare thee well, young hobbit"

tobinov met the press
"Maybe I'll stay after all now that it seems the HTs have disappeared.
"HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
"But seriously - where the hell are the HTs?
"Hard at work on mobile? They contracted it out. "Creating a new road map? Wait. Did they ever have one? "Finding new ways to engage their customers? HA! "Marketing to new users? HAHAHA! "Chasing their RL football clubs around Europe?
"...yeah, they probably consider that "marketing" - go Malmö.
"It's a joke.
"On 29 October 2013, we had 470 858 users; Today 362 875 - a net loss of 107 983.
"Nearly 25% gone in one year and not only did they stick to their price increase, they added Diamond at TWICE the price.
"Who is left to save the game? The Mods and GMs are left policing a dying game while the HTs have been dicking around with schemes and repackaged ideas - and users keep leaving.
"Even if I stayed, I doubt the game will be here a year from now.
"When will they have the balls to admit this?"

This year's cup run was an hard-fought battle. Meeting Elephantinhos FC, the top team of the last seasons, in the semi-finals left Bovista Lagos no other choice than taking full risk and hoping for a MOTS win against an Elephant PIN [matchid=497519710]. After having ruined TS with this bold move for the cup final, there was not much hope left against Africa Sports Nigeria [matchid=497646271]. Goriola decided to use a defensive and midfield heavy approach, playing once again MOTS and using the TDF as well as 4 defenders. Taking an early lead seemed to be proof of a good decision-making, but shortly after a defender was injured and a forward took his spot... No wonder Africa was able to equalize twice. Boavista saved itself with less midfield and 1 open defence side into extra time, and luckily even then no more goals found the way into the net. The penalty shoot-out finished in Boavistas favour and whole Lagos celebrates this triumph over Abuja. We are back!
Signup underway, first round draw will appear here in due course

יש אליפות!!!!!!!!
:-)

Fehlanzeige!?! Aus finanziellen Gründen ist es dem Verein nicht mehr möglich Presseerklärungen verfassen zu lassen und aus diesem Grund wird es nur noch sporadische Amateurartikel, oder wie in den letzten Monaten keine Artikel mehr zu lesen geben!!!

...ja, okay, Spiel souverän gewonnen... aber auch Torhüter Nummer zwei verletzt... was tun? Mit nem Verteidiger im Tor spielen? Oder von der Eigengewächs-Linie abweichen und nen alten Sack als Notlösung kaufen? Schwierige Entscheidung....
*grübel*
...

[b]11-13-2002[/b]
Clubul şi-a schimbat proprietarul când [b]Nicuch[/b] a preluat controlul şi l-a redenumit [b]WC Hepatita B[/b]

After 3 consecutive relegations, scoring some useful points feels good.
Snuck into the Global top 200k teams on HTEV as well!
[link=http://htev.org/team/243312/]
It didn't take long to get from 450k+ back to the top 200k. At this rate we'll be back in the top 100 sharpish! ;P

On the turn of his 33rd birthday, Mongaloids NI keeper Oscar Bruton tonight turned in one of the best performances of his career, achieving a 12.5 star rating as he captained the team to an away victory with divine defence stats. He may be getting on in years, but Bruton exemplifies how the experienced keeper is still worth his weight in gold!

PressAnnouncement.PressAnnouncementSubject: Scouse go top with narrow win
PressAnnouncement.PressAnnouncementBody:
Durch ein 2-1 im badischen Spitzenspiel über Heidelberg haben sich die Scouser erstmals in dieser Saison Platz 1 gesichert. Elliott McCarthy und Pierre-Henri Roger netzten schon vor der Pause entscheidend ein.
"Wir spielen schon eine richtig geile Saison. Jetzt haben wir die Riesenchance, im Rückspiel am Neckar bereits für eine kleine Vorentscheidung in Sachen Meisterschaft zu sorgen", sagte chris20474.
---
A 2-1 win over Heidelberg in the Baden derby and top clash has sent RSPFC top of the league for the first time this season. Elliott McCarthy and Pierre-Henri Roger scored the decisive goals in the first half.
"This is a great season for us. Now we have a fantastic chance to make a really big step towards the championship in the return leg at the banks of the River Neckar", chris20474 said.
[link=http://files2.adme.ru/files/news/part_72/722360/preview-650x390-650-1405334047.jpg]
